effect.shortEffect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.
effect.full: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing steel-type Pokémon cannot flee or switch out. Pokémon with run away can still flee. Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, Steel-type Pokémon have a higher encounter rate.

description.sun-moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
description.sword-shield: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
